data.name: Configuration_AlreadyInitialized

data.value: Board #{0} configuration error: {1}

data.name: Hardware_BoardAddressOutOfRange
data.value: The board #{1} on port {0} is out of range and will be ignored.

data.name: Hardware_BoardConfigurationMissing
data.value: No board for address #{1} on port {0} has been configured.

data.name: Hardware_DifferentBoardAddress
data.value: The command {1} has been sent to board #{2} on port {0} but the response originates from board #{3}.

data.name: Hardware_DifferentOpCode
data.value: The command {1} has been sent to board #{2} on port {0} but the response is for an op-code of {3}.

data.name: Hardware_InvalidChecksum
data.value: The checksum of the response to command {1} from board #{2} on port {0} is invalid.

data.name: Hardware_SetupComplete
data.value: The initialization of port {0} is complete. Number of boards connected: {1}

data.name: Manager_UnknownAction
data.value: The action "{2}" for switch "{1}" has been received from {0}. The event will be ignored because the action is unknown.

data.name: Manager_UnknownSwitch
data.value: A relay event for switch "{1}" has been received from {0}. The event will be ignored since no switch with that name is registered.

data.value: The following error occured in {0}: {1}
